name: quora_bulk_search
description: Search multiple questions on Quora in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling quora_search multiple times.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'how to learn Python,best AI tools,remote work tips')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="result"], [class*="Question"], [class*="pagedList"] > div'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const qEl = el.querySelector('[class*="question_text"], [class*="Question"] a span'); const aEl = el.querySelector('[class*="answer"], [class*="snippet"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/"]'); results.push({ question: qEl ? qEl.textContent.trim() : '', answer_preview: aEl ? aEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
